long_description: Designed for running in cool weather, the Patagonia Speedwork capris keep you motivated to burn calories by protecting your legs with their warm performance fabric and flattering, easy fit. Soft, stretchy fabric resists chilling wind and wicks moisture away from skin, preventing that clammy feeling while putting in the miles. Mesh panels behind the knees enhance breathability. Flattering back-to-front seaming protects skin against chafing. Wide, low-rise waistband sits comfortably flat next to skin; internal drawcord customizes fit. Internal key pocket easily holds a house key or small media player. The women's Patagonia Speedwork capris feature reflective piping on both legs to increase visibility in low light.
short_description: Designed for running in cool weather, the Patagonia Speedwork capris keep you motivated to burn calories by protecting your legs with their warm performance fabric and flattering, easy fit.
